subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Casino Drive has sustained an injury to his left hind foot, but a spokesman for the owner Hidetoshi Yamamoto said late Friday afternoon that the colt was expected to start on Saturday.
snippet: Casino Drive has sustained an injury to his left hind foot, but a spokesman for the owner Hidetoshi Yamamoto said late Friday afternoon that the colt was expected to start on Saturday.
